long_description: The Serfas USB Combo light pack is a compact, lightweight lighting option for bike commuting and includes both front and rear lights that can be recharged via USB ports. Soft, flexible silicone body around front light offers water-resistant performance and features an integrated mounting strap for easy attachment to your handlebar. Single white LED on front light can be cycled between high, low and 2 flashing modes; maximum output of 12 lumens. Red rear LED light has the same silicone body construction and mounting strap and has steady or flashing light modes; maximum output of 5 lumens. Both front and rear lights have rechargeable batteries that offer up to 8 hrs. of flashing use (3 hrs. on high); charge indicators let you know when it's time to recharge. Simply plug either of the lights in the the Serfas USB light pack into a USB port and it will recharge within 2.5 hrs.
